 <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Bcbcb0d12-4248-45f7-be09-722ecafc4e19%7D_diabetes.png> 	

Middle East & Africa wellness newsletter 


November 2024 

 <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Bc126220d-91e1-40d2-b6cb-df0b6286d51c%7D_2023-brand-leaf.png> 	

Understanding unique challenges and overcoming barriers for children and adults living with diabetes. 

Diabetes is one of the most common chronic illnesses worldwide, affecting millions of people across all age groups. The condition occurs when the body either doesn’t produce enough insulin or can’t effectively use the insulin it produces, leading to elevated blood sugar levels. Although diabetes in adults and children can share some similar symptoms, management strategies, and complications, each group faces unique challenges. Understanding these differences — and knowing how to overcome barriers to effective treatment — can empower people with diabetes and their families to lead healthier, more fulfilling lives. 

Read more <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2FhwwLCwRG4iGJ6O8F9izHJfzs5%3Fdomain%3Dimage2.comms.cigna.com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C2af0de1c75ee43087b3808dd0f8efd93%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638683829005409373%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=cGJHzFcsBsB%2Fwx4EJ0gRqBwHnt5PLveMdTSGYGpsK08%3D&reserved=0>
